text: Bessans is a commune. It is in Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes in the Savoie department in southeast France.Commune de Bessans (73040), INSEE It is known for its large Nordic skiing area in the winter and for its trekking and mountain climbing opportunities in the summer. == References == Category:Communes in Savoie Category:Ski areas and resorts in France
title: Bessans
